quotes_list.quote: Be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes_list.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes_list.quote: That which does not kill us makes us stronger.
quotes_list.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes_list.quote: We suffer more often in imagination than in reality.
quotes_list.author: Seneca

quotes_list.quote: You have power over your mind – not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
quotes_list.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes_list.quote: An eye for an eye only ends up making the whole world blind.
quotes_list.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes_list.quote: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.
quotes_list.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes_list.quote: It's not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.
quotes_list.author: Epictetus

quotes_list.quote: God is dead. God remains dead. And we have killed him.
quotes_list.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes_list.quote: As long as you live, keep learning how to live.
quotes_list.author: Seneca

quotes_list.quote: The only truly serious philosophical problem is suicide.
quotes_list.author: Albert Camus

quotes_list.quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
quotes_list.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes_list.quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
quotes_list.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes_list.quote: He who has a 'why' to live can bear almost any 'how'.
quotes_list.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes_list.quote: First they ignore you, then they laugh at you, then they fight you, then you win.
quotes_list.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes_list.quote: It is not because things are difficult that we do not dare; it is because we do not dare that they are difficult.
quotes_list.author: Seneca

quotes_list.quote: The best revenge is to be unlike him who performed the injury.
quotes_list.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes_list.quote: Man is condemned to be free; because once thrown into the world, he is responsible for everything he does.
quotes_list.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes_list.quote: Where there is love, there is life.
quotes_list.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes_list.quote: To live is to suffer, to survive is to find some meaning in the suffering.
quotes_list.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes_list.quote: Don't seek for everything to happen as you wish it would, but rather wish that everything happens as it actually will – then your life will flow well.
quotes_list.author: Epictetus

quotes_list.quote: The future depends on what you do today.
quotes_list.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes_list.quote: You must not lose faith in humanity. Humanity is an ocean; if a few drops of the ocean are dirty, the ocean does not become dirty.
quotes_list.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes_list.quote: There are many causes for which I am prepared to die, but no cause for which I am prepared to kill.
quotes_list.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes_list.quote: I am the one who will not betray his land.
quotes_list.author: Uladzimir Karatkevich

quotes_list.quote: To live means to fight, to love, to create, and not to be afraid.
quotes_list.author: Uladzimir Karatkevich

quotes_list.quote: We are left with a heritage: the land beneath white wings.
quotes_list.author: Uladzimir Karatkevich

quotes_list.quote: And who goes there, and who goes there, across the plundered land?
quotes_list.author: Yanka Kupala

quotes_list.quote: My Belarus, my flower, my life.
quotes_list.author: Yanka Kupala

quotes_list.quote: We only need to live, and with our lives to prove that we are a people.
quotes_list.author: Yanka Kupala

quotes_list.quote: The land gives bread, and labor gives everything.
quotes_list.author: Yakub Kolas

quotes_list.quote: Happiness is in work, in love, in understanding the world.
quotes_list.author: Yakub Kolas

quotes_list.quote: Nature is a book that must be read with the heart.
quotes_list.author: Yakub Kolas

quotes_list.quote: The most terrible thing about war is its ordinariness.
quotes_list.author: Vasil Bykaŭ

quotes_list.quote: There is nothing more terrible than a person who has lost faith in oneself.
quotes_list.author: Vasil Bykaŭ

quotes_list.quote: The individual has always had to struggle to keep from being overwhelmed by the tribe. If you try it, you will be lonely often, and sometimes frightened. But no price is too high to pay for the privilege of owning yourself.
quotes_list.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes_list.quote: Become what you are.
quotes_list.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes_list.quote: Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.
quotes_list.author: Seneca

quotes_list.quote: True happiness is to enjoy the present, without anxious dependence upon the future.
quotes_list.author: Seneca

quotes_list.quote: Every new beginning comes from some other beginning's end.
quotes_list.author: Seneca

quotes_list.quote: Accept the things to which fate binds you, and love the people with whom fate brings you together, but do so with all your heart.
quotes_list.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes_list.quote: Waste no more time arguing about what a good man should be. Be one.
quotes_list.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes_list.quote: It is not death that a man should fear, but he should fear never beginning to live.
quotes_list.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes_list.quote: Man is not worried by real problems so much as by his imagined anxieties about real problems.
quotes_list.author: Epictetus

quotes_list.quote: First say to yourself what you would be; and then do what you have to do.
quotes_list.author: Epictetus

quotes_list.quote: Freedom is the only worthy goal in life. It is won by disregarding things that are not in our control.
quotes_list.author: Epictetus

quotes_list.quote: The only way to deal with an unfree world is to become so absolutely free that your very existence is an act of rebellion.
quotes_list.author: Albert Camus

quotes_list.quote: In the midst of winter, I found there was, within me, an invincible summer.
quotes_list.author: Albert Camus

quotes_list.quote: Life is the sum of all your choices.
quotes_list.author: Albert Camus

quotes_list.quote: Hell is other people.
quotes_list.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes_list.quote: Freedom is what you do with what's been done to you.
quotes_list.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes_list.quote: We are our choices.
quotes_list.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes_list.quote: Life can only be understood backwards; but it must be lived forwards.
quotes_list.author: Søren Kierkegaard

quotes_list.quote: The greatest hazard of all, losing one's self, can occur very quietly and painlessly.
quotes_list.author: Søren Kierkegaard

quotes_list.quote: Anxiety is the dizziness of freedom.
quotes_list.author: Søren Kierkegaard

quotes_list.quote: The mystery of human existence lies not in just staying alive, but in finding something to live for.
quotes_list.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes_list.quote: To go wrong in one's own way is better than to go right in someone else's.
quotes_list.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes_list.quote: Happiness does not come from comfort or riches, but from freedom and suffering.
quotes_list.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes_list.quote: One is not born, but rather becomes, a woman.
quotes_list.author: Simone de Beauvoir

quotes_list.quote: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
quotes_list.author: Simone de Beauvoir
